content:
I am a first-year Ph.D. student in Cognitive Neuroscience Program at University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. I am interested in integrating neuroscience techniques, disorder model and computational modeling to study the neural mechanisms underlying social cognition and social decision making.
 “I would like to be remembered as someone who used whatever talent she had to do her work to the very best of her ability.” Ruth Bader Ginsburg
summary: I am a senior student double concentrating in Psychology and Sociology at Wuhan University. I am interested in integrating neuroscience techniques, disorder model and computational modeling to study the neural mechanisms underlying social cognition and social decision making.
title: Xiang Quan
